summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 61st Street, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 26th Avenue Northwest; West Sixty-second Street and West Sixty-fourth Street, each form 8th Avenue Northwest to 36th Avenue Northwest; West Sixty-third Street, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 32nd Avenue Northwest; Fourteenth Avenue Northwest and Eighth Avenue Northwest, each from West 60th Street to West 65th Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6132, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
